name: REWIND, PLEASE
description:
IMPORTANT: 

please do not go into fullscreen. Canvas is not properly configured and looks wrong sized. I'll upload an updated version soon and leave a link but I won't be able to do it until rating for the jam is over.

REWIND PLEASE is a parody of the great PAPERS PLEASE.

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2.

Updates are planned. Feedback would be awesome!

Enjoy.
